items.sentence: Tom is about thirty minutes behind schedule.
Tom is always broke by the end of the month.
Tom should be able to get it done by Monday.
It\'s been three years since I last saw Tom.
Tom very seldom kisses his children anymore.
Tom volunteered to be the designated driver.
Tom waited for what seemed like a long time.
Tom used to have a big house on Park Street.
Tom used to tell me stories about Australia.
Tom usually does his homework before dinner.
Can you spare me a few minutes of your time?
Can you teach me how to apologize in French?
Can you tell me where I can find a hospital?
Tom finds Mary\'s mother quite intimidating.
I didn\'t have Tom\'s permission to do that.
I didn\'t know Tom didn\'t know how to swim.
I think Tom really doesn\'t know the answer.
Tom plays table tennis just about every day.
I wonder who Tom sold his first painting to.
I know you don\'t ever want to see me again.
